title: Was a Small Child Handcuffed at Dulles Airport Due to Entry Restrictions?
subtitle: A photograph from a separate viral outrage was recaptioned with the claim that it shows a small child in handcuffs at Dulles Airport in January 2017.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A photograph shows a small boy who was handcuffed at Dulles Airport due to temporary immigration restrictions implemented in January 2017.
